    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Discord Fulu](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2031)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Fulu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=378" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Misfortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=110" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 77 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 22 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 hour

**Usage** affixed to a creature

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Incorporating green in its writing, a _discord fulu_ is a popular but unethical tool often deployed on romantic rivals to foil their advances. While the fulu is affixed to it, a creature treats its attitude toward other creatures as one step worse than it is. The creature also takes a –1 status penalty to [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) checks. The first failure the creature rolls on a Diplomacy check becomes a critical failure instead, and the fulu turns to ash, ending its effect.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
